title: On Santa’s Bad List? Get on Santa’s Rad List with Trash Free Trails and Muc-Off #BadtoRad
content:
Muc-Off has teamed up with Trash Free Trails for the #BadtoRad Christmas Campaign. The initiative looks to encourage riders to pick up any litter at their local riding spot in a bid to keep our forests, moors and waterways free of trash.
